long_description: Lightweight and forgiving, and perfect to learn on, the Burton Chicklet girl's snowboard is the perfect choice for developing riders looking for a board that can help take them to the next level. Easy Rider(TM) edge tune features beveled, catch-free edges that encourage progression; Flat Top profile features a flat profile between feet for stabiliy and balance. More than just a mellow version of other kids' snowboards, the Chicklet features a less dramatic sidecut and a mellow camber and edge tune. Twin shape and twin flex: this board is symmetrical from tip to tail for a balanced ride that's equally versatile whether ridden regular or switch. Tip-to-tail wood core is durable and provides a forgiving flex for edge control and solid turns. Fiberglass construction provides torsional forgiveness, board feel and edge hold, perfect for advancing to the next level. Burton Chicklet snowboard has an easy-to-maintain extruded base to keep kids moving fast in all conditions. .
short_description: Lightweight and forgiving, and perfect to learn on, the Burton Chicklet girl's snowboard is the perfect choice for developing riders looking for a board that can help take them to the next level.
